function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inferred mobility patterns based on high-resolution maps of residential density","Impact":"Incorrect patterns may lead to improper identification of high-risk areas for disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regularly update and validate the mobility patterns with real-world data and expert analysis","Technologies":"GIS mapping software, machine learning algorithms for pattern recognition","People":"Public health officials, urban planners","Owner":"Public health agencies, city government"},{"Description":"Model parameters capturing the effects of transportation infrastructure","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of transportation infrastructure may lead to misjudgment of travel patterns and disease spread","Mitigation":"Regular calibration of model parameters with up-to-date transportation infrastructure data","Technologies":"Transportation network modeling software, real-time transportation data feeds","People":"Transportation engineers, urban planners","Owner":"Transportation departments, city government"},{"Description":"Calculation of Trip Attraction Strength (TAS) based on education and economic activities","Impact":"Improper estimation of daily visitors may lead to incorrect assessment of the level of human interaction and disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regular validation of TAS with actual visitation data and employment statistics","Technologies":"Economic data analysis tools, statistical modeling software","People":"Economists, urban planners, public health officials","Owner":"City economic departments, public health agencies"}]}
